content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work and noticed a red object above my car above the treetops.  i thought it might be a helicopter, but i had to turn left and then couldn't see it.  i got home and parked my car on the hill and tried to look for the object but didn't see it.  all of a sudden i saw red objects shooting up the hill.  they were round red lights and looked like they were close to the bottom of the hill or close to the ground and ascending up the hill over my head.  someone was walking down the sidewalk and i got out of my car and said do you see those.  they said "yes" and i said "what are they".  they said "i don't know, and they walked on."  i then called my grandson who lives with me to come downstairs and look out the front door.  he did and saw the sky full of these objects just like i was seeing them. they looked awesome. there must have been 20-30 at least moving in a se direction.  they got further away until they disappeared.  i always look at red lights in the sky since i saw another one in june 2014 that was dull red moving along the treetops.  again, at first i thought it might be a helicopter.  i was on the top floor of a parking garage when i first saw it and i waited for it to get closer.  all of a sudden i saw a red zig zag line that scared me and i jumped.  it then turned into kind of a diamond shape with a bunch of lights.  it was not too large but i am unsure how far away it was.  this one was more complicated looking and hard to explain.  it disappeared so i got out of my car and looked up and saw a red rim and what looked like an outline of a disc in the dark. then it completley disappeared.  i am not sure why these objects are in the small town that i live in.  seeing something twice within a few months is a little unnerving.  it's too bad i am not tech savy since i could have a lot of awesome pictures.  i was too nervous to even get the camera on my cheap "pay as you go" phone to work.
content.summary: About 20-30 bright red round objects ascended a few at a time from ground level up a hill and over my head.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i was one of the first few witnesses of the phoenix lights. 

i was going camping at some native american ruins about 17 miles north of prescott, az. i noticed a bright cluster of stars far to the north and high up in the sky. if i put my arm straight out, and spaced my fingers at the widest point they would have been less than half of an inch. they did not appear natural (they were very bright and shaped like a boomerang) so i watch them wondering what constellation it was. 

after approx. 5 minutes, i thought that they may have been aircrafts in a wedge formation as they were getting closer. within 15 minutes it was right above me. i felt that i could have hit it with a rock it was that close. it was one craft with 5 white lights. i thought it was a stealth bomber as it was shaped like a triangle and blocked out the stars, but it was completely silent. i estimated it to be about 1 mile wide. 

i only share this now because i believed i saw it "swoop" down from what appeared to be space and figured i was probably one of the first few to see it.
content.summary: I observed the phx lights descend from space

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright day with sunshine in the middle of the afternoon. i was a resident of north bennington in the state of vermont. i was ten years of age. i was outside of a shoe store there with a young woman. my parents were in the store shopping, and there were no other people in the vicinity. to my knowledge there were no other witnesses to the event. the two of us were talking together, when we turned to look in noticing a disc that was hovering about five hundred feet away, and about one hundred feet from the ground. there was no sound emanating  from the dark disc. the disc was about thirty feet in diameter. it was a quiet day without inclement weather, and without a wind. there was no vehicular traffic in the area, as this was a rural town. after about fifteen seconds, we both became aware that this was an unidentified flying object. our reaction was one of a mutual wonder and elation in witnessing this event. i mentioned to the young woman that was with me to go into the shoe store and to tell everyone inside to come out and to see this. it took her about thirty seconds to get to the store, and then i was alone with the object that was still hovering in a stationary position. after about fifteen more seconds, the dark colored disc exited the sky in a non-ballistic motion and was gone. there was no engine noise, vapor trail, or any atypical acceleration aspects of the ufo. there were no other people in the store that were able to come out and see this in time. i went back into the shoe store and told the clerk at the counter, and my parents what i had seen. i do not remember if there were other patrons that were in the store when i went back in. the young woman that was with me reiterated what we had seen. the man at the checkout counter was openly in disapproval, as when i was young to have believed in extraterrestrial phenomenon was a sign of a lost contact with reality. my parents sided with the clerk at the counter, as though this was the product of a youthful fantasy of mine, or a mistaken interpretation of what i had seen. after forty five years of trying to make sense of this personal experience, it has taken me this long to venture a description of these events. in the year of 1974, i was nearly a straight a student at a private school in an upper class neighborhood in massachusetts. less than a year and a half later i did not even graduate with a high school diploma at another private school in pennsylvania that was attributed to the mental and physical abuse from my father that ensued after i had witnessed this ufo. both of my parents were involved in classified government research on psychic phenomenon at the edgar cayce foundation. i have been subjected to mental and physical violence all of my life in one form or another as far back as i can remember: i was different, and i have paid a high personal price for this. my father mentally tortured me for the first twenty four years of my life with the hope of inducing a suicidal response in order to prevent the interpretation of these events that was external to the influence of the family that would be outside of their personal discretion to decide for themselves to allow. since the year of 1984 i have been hospitalized fourteen times, and six of those in psychiatric hospitals. i have been made destitute three separate times in my life. for reasons that are still unclear to me, i was being used as a warning to these extraterrestrial intelligences, and to other people, of what will happen to anyone that is given an education by these telepathic being's from other planets that the current security mandates do not control in direct oversight as a classified matter. often this operates outside of the accepted parameters to not violate someone's legal rights in the process by those with a personal as contrasted to a professional interest that operate outside of government regulation. i learned this the hard way, so to speak. after my father illegally disposed of all of my personal property in may of 1984, i found myself at a bus station with eleven hundred dollars with nowhere to go, and nothing to be able to do when i got there. after relocation to the state of hawaii under duress, there was another interesting turn of events that occurred when i was resting in an open field next to hilo international airport about two weeks after i got there. it was a calm night, in an early evening in darkness. in the sky directly above me about one hundred and fifty feet from the ground, three oblong objects that were shrouded in a white mist approached overhead. these appeared to be dirigibles, as one lightly collided with one of the others: extraterrestrial vehicles do not do so, and this was not the result of pilot error: i intuitively knew to not trust this expensive illusion that was meant to parallel the event in 1970. there were numerous other witnesses to this staged event in hawaii, as i could hear other people talking in the background nearby. prior to this formal description that i am providing in the here and now, i had never ventured any communication of my experiences to a branch of the government, or an independent investigative function involved in the research on extraterrestrial phenomenon. there are government security mandates that are outdated that concern the activities of extraterrestrial intelligences, and the intention of these telepathic beings to be here. the machinations that i have observed in the interaction with other people of similar experience with extraterrestrial visitation is to ensure that there is not a concern to the infrastructure of the military as a possible jeopardy. these alien intelligences tend to decide for themselves who it is that is in a position to best bridge this distance to prevent further adversity from happening to innocent people that become the focus of an animosity for just having seen a genuine ufo. those of us that have been caught in this crossfire deserve to be able to make a decent life for ourselves without a censure or a reprimand for having witnessed this type of event. it is unusual for someone at such a young age, such as i was, to have seen an extraterrestrial vehicle. the void creates the need in society, and the function that i filled in this is classified matter is something that i discuss with no one. if i can help even so much as one other person that has seen an actual ufo to be spared the living hell that i have been through, then it all will have been worth it. sometimes to keep to one's self is the best approach until the matter has subsided in controversy. after this long, i have the opportunity to talk about it without a coercion from another perspective forcing a compliance from me personally.
content.summary: Hovering disc that exited the sky to my left in non-ballistic motion

content.detailedDescription: I was in the navy and we were on a deployment. it was probably late 2006. we were heading across the atlantic ocean, from norfolk, towards spain. one evening the seas were unusually calm. the water was like looking at glass in all directions. the sunset was surreal, so i decided to take some pictures. i took three pictures before being called back inside. fast forward almost ten years and now im in college taking a photography class. while going through my pictures for an upcoming assignment i accidentally hit the zoom button and before my eyes was a real flying saucer! in the pictures the ufo is flying in a straight line and the saucer is clearly visible. in the second shot the ufo itself is missing but it's trail remains. perhaps the ufo was moving further away; or was using some kind of camouflage. the second trail is pretty far from the first one, meaning this object was probably moving at a really high speed. in my final picture the object has dropped significant altitude. its much closer to the horizon and the saucer is still not visible. the interesting thing about this particular picture is that the trail that was previously following the ufo is not pointed back in the opposite direction. i have always been very skeptical of things i cannot see or touch in person. but this evidence has left me with a much different taste in my mouth. i also have no experience or expertise at manipulating photos.
content.summary: Unusually clear water for mid atlantic, sunset pictures, found it after later analyzing photos

content.detailedDescription: Came out to my nannas & papa's for tea and they invited there friends over,which they live on a farm in the middle of hardwicke bay and warroka, yorke pensiula, sa. i had just finished my tea and i made a phonecall to one of my friends from school outside of the office. all of a sudden it was getting a little breezy and i said on the phone to my friend "i's getting a little windy,i'm getting a little cold is it windy where you are? and cold?" then i looked up at the trees because i could here the wind becoming more stronger then i looked at my phone again because it vibrated and then i heard like a swoshh.. like a whirly wind was happening i looked up and a object was hovering over the trees which it had yellow and orange lights around it shaped in a disc form, then a beam of a light blue and white came down not all the way just a little bit around 70-80cm from the under of the object off the ground, and it kept hovering i said "i will call you back soon" then ended the call. i was screaming because i had no idea what it was going doing to me because i had no idea what it was i didnt know if something was gonna jump out or if the object was going to move towards me and make the beam of light which was located under neath the object shine upon me beacuse i was thinking of the documentrey that i saw on the tv not long ago which the object beam of light shined upon these people and they were no where to be seen. the light from undernath fainted and it moved slowely east and i ran inside and got all the adults and i said "come quickly there is something in the sky that is moving away from it's where it was directly in front of me while i was talking on the phone! can you not here me screaming? qucikly" and they all came running out of the house to see it when we got out there it was moving very slowely away from where i was standing. as we were watching it we were trying to decide what is was by the lights and shape and the movemement then as i said "ufo" its lights just all switched of now its no where to been seen... tonight. now i feel so scared because i have no idea where it came from, how it got here on especially on yorke penisula,it just came out of no where! and i have no idea what to do i just dont want it to come back!I defiently dont want to get abducted!! and now i know we are not the only ones on this planet by the looks of it.
content.summary: Talking on my phone at night, light apppered with a beam of light looked up and an object was hovering like 20-25ft away from me then less than 40ft up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck looking north with my nikon binoculars (which are sharp enough to make out the galilean moons of jupiter). i was trying to determine whether i could see polaris (from a new house) or if it was obscured by distant trees, with the intent of calibrating my 10-inch celestron some future night, starting with polaris. while i was scanning that northern sky with the binoculars, a craft came into view. it was a triangle, blacker than the background night sky. there were white lights at each of the three corners and none elsewhere nor any of any other color. the lights were not "pinpoint" lights but rather appeared to be large flat cirles of light that appeared to be flush with the underside of the craft's body.  the lights were large and flat and disk-like, at each corner of the triangle and clearly within the outline of the triagle as opposed to being *at* the corners or external to the shape of the craft.  the light was a very pure white and even from edge to edge, rather like the sort of light perfectly diffused by a high-quality frosted glass.

above that triangular craft, about 2,000-2,500 ft. higher, there were two craft that were almost certainly smallish (likely one-man military) jets flying a parallel course (with the usual rotating beacons of red and blue). i'd estimate their altitude as 10-12,000 feet.  they were flying some significant distance apart (half a mile apprx.) but essentially lined up wingtip to wingtip. comparing the triangular craft to those jets indicated the craft was simply enormous--easily 2 to 3 times the length of an aircraft carrier. there was no sound. the triangle and the two jets were flying from due west to due east, fist sighted to my northwest and leaving my field of view to my northeast.

i am reporting it at this late date only because it's just tonight that i remembered there was an e-mail in my archive where i'd given a precise date to a friend about the sighting.  i've thought off and on that i should have reported it but couldn't recall the date.  it occurred to me only this evening that i'd mentioned it to a frequent correspondent, an engineer in florida.  a quick keyword search in my outlook archive pulled up the date, so i am reporting it now to mufon and to nuforc.

i spent 25 years in science and engineering as administrator overseeing many millions of research dollars on a wide variety of projects. one proposal to darpa (unfunded) just a couple of years before the sighting was for the construction of a similarly-large but entirely different sort of craft as something of an aerial aircraft carrier/troop transport. as far as i know, no such craft has been funded nor built, though i reckon it's remotely possible and perhaps has not publicly disclosed. i do know funding *was* awarded to a major corporation to explore potentional for just such a craft (for the very price i'd worked out in my own proposal).  the announcement came just as my own research group was finalizing our own proposal and precluded our submission. 

but i simply do not believe the craft was "ours" as there simply had not yet been enough time from that allocation of funding for mere initial research for such a craft to be designed, much less even a prototype to be constructed. 

and i've no doubt the two jets were military and were shadowing the triangle.

i'd read reports over the years of such triangular craft so while i was excited to see such a thing, i was not really shocked nor surprised, but essentially just quietly awed and riveted, at attention. i kept my binoculars trained on it until my view of it became obscured by the trees i had reckoned might (and do) obscure polaris from my backyard view.  

i'd seen the shaky photo of the "belgian triangle" a few years earlier and was well-aware of the central red light in that image and noted that there was no central light of *any* color on the triangle i saw.  and unlike the images i've seen on video (tonight, as a matter of fact) which show only relatively small lights which may or may not be connected by a structure, the structure of the craft i saw was clearly evident, jet-black against a significantly lighter night sky of bluish purple, and the edges were crisp.  it was, simply, a large triangle, with the white lights underneath, and those discs of white light were huge in and of themselves, compared to the jets overhead with their typical small pinpoint strobes. 

i have several telescopes and several binoculars and have spent a *lot* of time under the night sky over my 58 years. i've seen a few other unidentifiable things over the years, but nothing like this--an object that was *clearly* a "craft" of some type, obviously under intelligent control, in flight, with that flight perfectly matched in speed to the two jets overhead, with neither the jets nor the triangle lagging or overtaking, each maintaining a steady easterly course and steady altitude.)  

i'm well-acquainted with all sorts of airplanes as my father was a pilot and all-around airplane nut and i spent my childhood bucking rivets helping him build planes and every holiday was spent at some airshow or other and included flights in everything from a ford tri-motor to all sorts of newer civilian and military aircraft.  

also, there's a major training airbase here and i lived for 30 years near another that serves as a primary maintenance base elsewhere so i'm quite used to seeing aircraft of all sorts from single-manned fighters to the old b-52s to c5as flying so low their vortices twisted my treetops.  during daylight hours, those planes average one per minute over my home. i'm quite able to identify most, and probably more able than your average person to ascertain a type of plane and altitude and can identify most by sound alone.  (i can also tell you exactly what the busweiser blimp looks like when it crashes to the highway directly ahead on an otherwise pretty friday afternoon.)

as to what i thought the sept. 2006 object was when i first noticed it, i simply thought, "i'm seeing a large triangle craft just like i've read about".  for the reasons i've already stated above, i am all but certain it could not have been anything of terrestrial military origin.  in that minute while i watched it i believed it *was* an extraterrestrial craft and that it was being kept under surveillance by a pair of miltary jets.  when i think of the vast distnces of space, i'm always inclined to lean toward aerial things as having some earthly origin since our nearest neighbors are 59 trillion miles away and have no known habitalble planets. 

but that said, having thought about this for several years and knowing what i do about earthly craft (as much as one reasonably can without being currently in the industry), i just can't believe that such an enormous craft could remain a secret the way, for example, the sr-71 did for so long, and i will say that in that moment when i viewed it, without all this subsequent thinking about the unlikely odds of "someone" travelling those vast cosmic distances, i *knew* in my gut such a craft was beyond the capabilities of any country on earth.  i knew then that we might build such a thing someday, but i didn't believe we had then, nor do i yet think anyone's beyond the preliminary research stage on any such large craft that might prove feasible or useful for military purposes. 

but not knowing with 100 percent certainty either way, i can only believe it's one of two seeming impossibilities--an earthly craft far beyond the scale of anything ever known (even if not beyond the conception of myself and my former research team), or an otherworldly craft that has travelled the the unimagineable distance no craft conceived by man can yet travel.

at the time of the sighting, i really knew very little about mufon.  in the years since, i've seen a number of accounts of mufon investigators working with witnesses that seem credible to me.  i've begun to believe the organization is basicly objective in its evaluation of evidence and appropriately skeptical, and also appropriately open-minded to credible and verifiable evidence.  the data of many cases that can not be dismissed satisfactorally by more or less mundane phenomena is of interest to me and i'm adding my own data point here because i believe the inquiry is important, whether the explanation for such events is earthly or extraterrestrial.  i'd have reported it years earlier had i remembered before tonight that i had actually mentioned the sighting to an engineer in florida and had an e-mail record that pinpointed the actual date, without which i felt such a report could not truly be evaluated, since only with that date can my sighting be correlated with other evidence/testimony that might explain it one way or the other. 

(note:  i checked "wings" on "structural features" above because, simply, such a triangle is essentially a "delta wing", rather more like the concorde than the more boomerange form of the old "flying wing" i saw fly once when i was a kid. but technically, it is "wing", singular, rather than "wings" plural but that option is not available in the form above.)
content.summary: Clear sighting through sharp nikon binoculars of large triangular craft accompanied by two jets

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i had just stepped outside to go on a walk. i was noticing how clear of a night it was when i saw something dark move quickly to my left about 70 degrees up. my first thought was cloud but like i said it was a very clear night. then i noticed the lights and you could see the stars being blacked out as it crossed the sky. i have about a half mile of visibility between tree lines and it covered that distance in 5 - 10 seconds. then i saw where a similar object had been seen on that same night in mississippi. the picture posted was exactly what i saw.
content.summary: V shaped object with dim lights and silent. low travelling easily 80 mph

content.detailedDescription: Around 11pm was taking a picture of a thin cloud back lit by a bright moon.  took two pictures less than a second apart.  upon view the pictures i noted an object up and to the right of the moon.  on the second picture the object appeared to have traveled in a straight line down and to the left.  in the second picture the object appeared to be passing through the cloud between my vantage point and the moon.  picture 1 attached shows object up and right of the moon, picture 2 shows object just below and to the left of the moon.
content.summary: Object detected in photo of the moon

content.detailedDescription: I saw a contrail line with a missing gap in the middle of the smoke line, i thought it was odd and took photos of it as i'm an avid conspiracy theorist on contrail lines. only going back to realize in my photos was something mysteriously weird and after looking at them on my computer via high resolution can you see mysterious lights all over including something so bright it illuminates the clouds prior to me getting it in the middle of the frame in the next photo. i took photos one after another on my galaxy s5 clicking simultaneously. also there is a curved rainbow right where the one main ufo was it's very cool as i've never seen a half circle rainbow in the sky like that.
content.summary: Took photos of weird contrail line

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down in my bed in my room around 2:33 am in the dark when all of the sudden my room lid up with a blue plasma type of light the whole room lid up and went towards my window and i got scared and thought it was a helicopter flashing a light in my room so i looked out the window and there was a big blue flash light in the sky around 70 feet above me then took off really quick i felt scared and never seen anything like that in my life then around 10 mins later a black helicopter passed around the scene where i saw the blue light the helicopter had no lights on it it was just plain black and left right away only stood around for around 3 mins im thinking i was about to be abducted or something i didnt see no ship or flying object all i saw was a beam of light leave towards my room into the sky
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Blue light in my room then shot up to the sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light in the sky like a star but traveling like a plane. saw it for less than a minute,  then it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright light with appendages traveling straight then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home traveling west.  saw 2  bright objects.  what got my attention was no contrails.  i stopped and took my binoculars out and saw two bright tear shaped objects.  at first i thought that they were balloons, but they were moving in a cross crossing pattern.  then out of no where a third object appeared off to the north of them.M same shape and size but not participating, and then after about 5 minutes it just vanished.

they didn't appear to lose any altitude but disappeared behind clouds on the horizon.  

i was stunned.  i am a very skeptical person, but this has me thinking what i saw wasn't of this world.  can't. describe it, but this got my pulse jumping.
content.summary: Driving and saw two bright objects cross crossing silently then joined by a third

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country. we have approximately ten acres. the other night, about 8:30p.M. i went outside to bring our dog inside the house. it was very cold that night and we were worried our dog could not tolerate the cold temperatures. as i was opening the gate to his yard i noticed what i thought was a very bright star on the hirizon. it was particularly noticeable, because it appeared to be so close. when i went inside our house i called for my wife and daughter to also look at what i observed. we spent the next several minutes watching as this light pulsated white, then blue light. it gradually descended over the horizon. occasionally, there was a "wave" of light that emanated out from the center. over the next several days we've been hearing jets flying over our property.

jets flying over our property is not uncommon. we have lived here for thirteen years. during that time we've witnissed dogfights and arial maneuvers where objects were dropped, trailing smoke behind them. i assumed they were flares of some sort. 

i'm not sure what i saw, but it was not normal. 

any information would be appreciated!

thank you.

[name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Bright, star-like orb that hovered then descended over the horizon/ wooded area. planes have been flying over this area for several days. could be some kind of air force maneuvers?

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i had just stepped outside to go on a walk. i was noticing how clear of a night it was when i saw something dark move quickly to my left about 70 degrees up. my first thought was cloud but like i said it was a very clear night. then i noticed the lights and you could see the stars being blacked out as it crossed the sky. i have about a half mile of visibility between tree lines and it covered that distance in 5 - 10 seconds. then i saw where a similar object had been seen on that same night in mississippi. the picture posted was exactly what i saw.
content.summary: V shaped object with dim lights and silent. low travelling easily 80 mph

content.detailedDescription: Hello my name is james i was outside walking my dog in the neighborhood. i observed a helicopter as i turned i also observed what i thought was an airplane coming overhead it was there and very clear in the blink of an eye it was gone no trace nothing
content.summary: Helicopter came by as i turned my head ufo appeared and disappeared in about 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Ufo
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: In november 2001 in the late evening/night i realised that i had run out of nappies/diapers for my baby son & had to walk up to our local 7 to 11 shop up at broadwater,worthing,west sussex to buy some before they closed.I put the baby into his pram & had to get my 10 year old daughter out of bed & into her coat to come with me.We ran up there as it was late made our purchases & started walking home again,we turned into carnegie road & walked past northbrook college & down towards south farm rd where we lived as we drew level with the grave yard in carnegie rd we were looking at the stars as it was a cold & clear winter night & the stars were very visible,i noticed one that appeared very large indeed & pointed at it saying to my daughter"wow thats a large one!" as i pointed at it what i had thought was a star shot off at a speed that i have never seen anything move before! i said to my daughter "my god did you see that?That was no star & the speed of it!"i remember feeling quite shaken & my daughter replied i know mum but i am more worried about whats above our heads! i looked up & was totally "gobsmacked!" i do not know how else to put it,i thought this must be a nightmare & i would soon wake up!Above our heads was a truly massive craft don`t know what else to call it,rectangular in shape & reminded me of a gigantic chessboard because the underneath appeared to be loads of squares but with pulsating lights in which constantly changed colour, pulsating different colours red,blue,green,violet,yellow virtually every colour i can imagine.I was terrified & i could just about make out a dark or black outline & there appeared to be some kind of structure above the main rectangle. i am afraid that i did not look up for any longer because i was afraid for my children & myself but all i could think was that you [language removed/cms/rjl] are not getting my children(this has really stuck in my mind)i said to my daughter hold onto the pram handle & run with me faster than you have ever run before we have to get away & get home.I honestly do not remember the journey home it was about half a mile to home from where we were & the only thing i can remember is suddenly finding myself at our front door .Shaking all over so much that i could not get the key to go into the lock,i had to ring on the bell to get my now ex-husband to let us in as he was home by then.I tried to tell him what had happened but he looked at me like i was mad really crazy,he said where on earth have you been until 12.30am??That was when i realised that this fairly short journey had appeared to have taken much longer than it normally would.Looking back on it i do wonder if it could possibly have taken so long as i am a fast walker & i do not hang about when walking out late at night & especially with two young children.I asked my daughter recently if she remembered that night & she replied "yes of course how could i possibly ever forget it!!"she also said to me that she could not remember our journey home & asked me if i could....It was then that i realised for sure that i could not, this strikes me as being odd but i really do not know if this was due to us being so frightened or really terrified of it & desperate to get away or if for some reason unknown we cannot remember & i do not know the answer to this question.We left home that night at about 10.40pm i know this because we only had about 20 minutes to get there before the shop closed.We arrived home at about 12.30am & this is a journey that would normally take me about 45 minutes tops,but i cannot be sure for how long we stood looking up at the craft....I was so afraid that i doubt it was for very long!!My daughter summed it up the other day she said could we have had some missing time do you think??Of this i really do not know how to answer. i realise that i have left it rather a long time to report this incident but after seeing my then husbands reaction to my tale i thought that if i reported it i would be ridiculed by people & i did not want my daughter being laughed at when at school but also i knew that my marriage was in big trouble at that time & soon after we split up & divorced etc so this kind of took over all of my mind & concentration for a long while afterwards,therefore this whole sighting went out of my mind for a few years.I had another ufo sighting in 2012 & this is what really made me start to think that i should have reported this incident in 2001.Also i told my dad about it not long before he sadly passed away & he said that i must report it some time soon,as he believed that this type of incident should be looked into...I kind of feel that i owe it to my wonderful dad who is now sadly passed on & so i have at last reported it.
content.summary: On way back from shopping trip at night was looking at the stars observed one large star pointed at it it moved incredibly fast then descended to treetop level above our heads

content.detailedDescription: I was on a cross country trip to seattle for work reasons. while on my way i took several pictures of the scenery. this photo was taken while passing through wyoming, i never noticed the object until later that night while veiwing my photos. i know what it looks like, those who i have shown the photo also agree as to what it looks like. im not scepticle but i would like to know if this is an actual airborn craft,or a camera anomaly. i dont believe  that its  a reflection off my windsheild. i really would like to know what i captured one way or another. please e-mail me your results.
content.summary: It appears to be shaped like, well lets face it the enterprise from star trek??

content.detailedDescription:
i have a roof terrace in roquebrune cap martin village, i went on it like i usually do , before super and had some fresh air.
this time i observed an unusual very large bright light shaped like a cross with multiple branches.
i had the feeling that the light was observing me and was coming closer to me.
i stay out for 2 or 3 minutes watching making sure it wasn't a airplane beacon.
i rushed back to take my phone to take pictures but when i came back, the light was gone.

this is not the first time i saw something, the first time was last year in july and it was something with an unusual shape with a moving light.
content.summary: Object very brighter then usual, with a shape like a cross with multiple branches.

content.detailedDescription: First of all ,the following account is true and is to the best of my knowledge is the way it happened.  i was in 1972 an airmen in the usaf stationed at keno afs, oregon out of kingsley field oregon. i was a radar height operator during my time there on the mountain. i received orders to go to udorn thailand in 1972. in august of 1972 i packed my family with wife at that time, and young daughter who was born in may of 1971,and a young labrador retriever puppy. we were heading to laredo texas for some leave, where both our families resided and my wife would be living with her parents while i was away.  i was driving a 1971 mustang mach i, and towing a trailer with most of our belongings on it.  i remember we left in early afternoon and intended to stop only as necessary so as to make it home as soon as possible. the labrador puppy had been given small dosage tranquilizer pills by the base vet so as to keep him calm and sleep since he was riding in a dog carrier at tailgate of the trailer. he was very comfortable and i foresaw no problems as long as we kept to our schedule. the baby was fed and asleep in the back seat where we had set up a make shift crib.  at about 2:00 am we were heading west on a long dark stretch of road but could see it was one of those roads that went on forever and then over a distant hill, more highway  if you know what i mean. my wife was asleep when i first saw what looked to be some sort of a road block set-up ahead about a mile ahead. i could see the reflection of the cross stripes on a low wooden type structure, is why i though of it as a road block. but i started to wonder why a road block at this time? i was traveling at about 70 miles per hr. so i knew i would soon come up to it. i woke up my wife to see if she saw the same thing. i started to slow down anyway because i am a law abiding person, used to taking orders. as i got closer i saw no one at the road block just the low road block structure strung across the right side of the highway. i was about one city block length away from the road block and still no one manning it. suddenly our puppy in back started to howl, but not like a puppy howl or yelp, but like some sort of monster from hell and very loud howling and just continued to do so till after we passed this area. all my hair stood up on the back of my neck.  my wife and i looked at each other and i hit the gas pedal, feeling very much in danger. something told me to go and not stop, which i obeyed,  i swept around the roadblock on its left side. my wife and i both looked to our right. there was a strange set up and it looked like three daises raised around a cleared center area, like a basketball court with bleachers but one side missing.  very bright lights illuminated it, one dais was facing south and about 100 ft. across more or less and the other two facing each other east and west about same length and all three connected with the south side open.  in this areas were many men or not, very white in coloring and they were all wearing what i saw was bright blue overalls and scampering around. there were many pieces of equipment around the inset of the dyes but the center part was clear almost like a short runway or large landing pad.  my wife said she saw the same thing except that she saw them wearing white overalls and that they all looked bluish in coloring to her. i looked in the side mirrors and no one was following us. no lights no police , nothing. i was going about 75 miles per hr. sand didn't slow down for at least 30 minutes to an hr. i did slow down though and saw that my wife was still nervous ,but that our daughter was still fast asleep, the puppy was quiet. i started to look for a place to stop and rest, with people around. i saw a light to our right in the near distance just off the highway  so i slowed down and carefully pulled into  what looked like an old style storefront parking area with a light swinging in the warm desert breeze from the store and i remember it even made that rusty sound as it swung back and forth the, i told my wife we would stay here and in the morning we could get something to eat or drink there. we agreed, i remember getting out of the car and i could see the outline of the store front as i went in back and relieved myself before getting back into the car. next thing i remember there was a sharp knocking on my car window. it was a man checking to see if we were alright. i woke up fully and remembered that i felt as though i had slept for a hundred years, the best i had ever felt or since and fully energized and alive. the man was not excited and said he wanted to know how the accident happened? i said what accident? he said yours. he said you are 200 from the highway, sitting in the middle of the desert. i just happened to see you as i was driving by. he asked if we were alright? i looked around my wife was just waking up and my daughter was still fast asleep. i said yes i feel great. i looked around, there was no store front no store sign swinging in the breeze and no store. we were in a clearing off the highway. it was a bright sunny day. my reaction at that time was nonchalant, and very strange when i look back at it. i checked on the puppy, he was fine. the car and trailer looked fine. i looked like i pulled off the highway in a straight line to the position i was found in. i did notice that the truck driver was driving what is typically called an 18 wheeler and that he was parked far to the left on the highway  of where we ended up. i thought at that time boy he must have great eyesight. he said go ahead and pull off the road to be sure the car is ok. as i did this i noticed a bump in the trailer axle. upon further inspection i could see it was bent. i can't think of anyway it could happen unless i pulled off and hit something the night prior, but i remember being careful. i thanked the truck driver without exchanging any information nor did he offer any.  anyway i was regulated to going about 45 miles per hr. till we hit the next town. i am not sure but i think it was mercury nevada? at this small town i stopped at a service station that told me the trailer was ruined and too dangerous to continue with it. being an airman at the time i had little money to rent another one instead i sold some our belongings and gave the rest away along with the puppy to the service station owner. we took it all in stride and just kept going. it only started to bother me years later by 1981 i had divorced my then wife and life went on. but i still speak to her on occasion and this incident does come up and she still remembers the same thing. i did not report this sooner because of my position with the usaf. i later worked in air force intelligence and as a crew member of an e3a training squadron. i then worked for a us government agency where i also feared some sort of repercussions. i an now retired, this happened along time ago. even if it falls along the parameters of the secrets act it has been about 40 years and by now should be declassified.
content.summary: Traveling in early morning with my family form keno afs to laredo texas my wife at the time and i were involved in an unknown phenomen in nevada,which to this day makes me nervous to talk about it.

content.detailedDescription: Headed south and noticed a triangular formation to the east of me.  i had to turn and when i was again facing the lights (few minutes time) the top light had broke formation and was traveling in a northwestern direction. well i had to stop on the side of the road to take pictures and try to view it with my binoculars.  i wish i could have gotten the formation before the top craft broke it.  i was in awe because i here people talking about lights in a triangular shape and i had never experienced it.  these lights seemed awful low to me when i first noticed them and they were just staying still until that one on top moved.  when  it moved i was video taping them and had noticed that when i viewed it on a big screen and not my cell phone screen i could see a small flashing silvery-blue light going the opposite direction and faster than the craft it was flying by.  it also seemed to fly in a uneven path and would get close to the craft. well the first light got to the distance where i couldn't see it behind the church that i was at.  i filmed the other two lights as the second light had broke formation and was taking the same path as the first light.  seemed like it was almost identical in height and speed as the first one and on the exact path as the first one as well.  that one had passed behind the church so i couldn't see it anymore.  i looked at the third light but my arms were sore from holding the big heavy camera that i finally had to go home.
content.summary: Triangular lights above texas city tx

content.detailedDescription:
I went up to feed my livestock,when i noticed a very bright light in the sky. i thought it must be a plane coming towards me so i went about feeding the animals. i kept an eye on it and it had not moved so i decided this was strange and got out my i-phone and took a picture of it. i watched it for five more minutes and than fog came in and covered up the lights. the lights pulsated on the ends of it, the left side was brighter than the right. my little i-phone does not do justice to what i saw.  i blew up the picture and you can see that it looks like the lights are connected to each other. i saw my neighbor a week later and told her about it and showed her the picture on my phone. she told me she had seen the same light three nights in a row. i will try to send you to photo.


 i would like to know what your thought are on this.
content.summary: Pulsating white light in the west not moving in the a.M.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work. i don't normally go back roads home from my job but i had stopped at a mcdonald's to grab dinner that night so i took back roads home. it was around 10:45pm when i noticed a weird light event happening to the right side of the road. i immediately slowed down and turned off my radio and air vents. there was a very bright, white, circular light moving adjacent to the direction of my car. this went on for a minute and then it stopped and hovered over a remote hill top near my house. this is when i started to become really curious. at first, i immediately thought it was just a low flying helicopter. but then i realized it wasn't making any noise and the light wasn't casting off a beam or illuminating anything. it was just a circular ball of very bright white light sitting in the sky. during this entire ordeal, i was less than a mile from the event. i drove towards the light, trying to maybe make out an aircraft of some sort but didn't see any origin of the light. the weirdest part that made me feel a bit uneasy was that there was absolutely no noise made. there was no chopping of helicopter blades, whirring of plane propellers, or roar of jet engines. it was dead silent. i pulled up and got within maybe a couple hundred feet of it. it was sitting above and to the right of a radio tower, which gave me an idea of how low this thing really was. i stopped my car to observe it. it was just sitting there pulsating light. i continued driving towards it and took my eyes off of it just a second to look at the road and the moment i turned back to look at it, it was gone. i have no idea where it went because where i witnessed it was at the top of a remote hill top and you can see for quite some distance around. if it had been an airplane or a helicopter, there would've been some sort of light sequence (which there wasn't) and there would've been noise (which there wasn't) and you would've been able to track it from where i was. i saw nothing in the sky moving away or trailing in a certain direction. just empty night sky. i am attaching pictures of the area where i saw the light.
content.summary: Saw bright, circular, pulsing light move around then hover on a remote hill top near my home.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in the back yard doing some product testing (photo light painting). in between shots, i noticed a bright light coming through tall pine trees on our west side of house. first suspected it was a helicopter coming over the city. as it cleared the trees it seemed to have the wrong colors of any earth flying vehicle and moved way too smoothly in a straight line. as it got closer i kept expecting to hear at least some engine noise or rotor blade noise. no sound whatsoever. i moved west to east along one of our main streets (speedway blvd, possibly broadway) - as it was perpendicular looking south at approx 45 degrees elevation, i was still expecting something to show as recognizable such as a plane's wings, blue or red lights. nothing of the sort. no sound, just a very smooth floating eastward. we were both mesmerized for about 5 minutes of observing as in disbelief. i unfortunately had the camera tied down and a wide angle lens and realized it would not be a good shot as it would simply show a bright spot. also with the moon having been as bright as it was, i was in denial thinking it had to be some plane. but now outline of wings or tail (helicopter) showed even from the moon brightness. the disbelief was also caused by it flying over a city as it did as in our minds, we truly thought this would only happen in barren areas. i should have know better as i have seen and by accident filmed in time lapse two other events, one in particular over the same mountain range where this one finally dissipated/disappeared from one moment to the next.
content.summary: Glowing red orange orb traveling straight line overhead west to east dissapeared over rincon mtn range

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i back in 1992, parked his pickup truck into a parking spot at autumn ridge apartments around 1am (the parking spot was all the way in the back along the tree line). i just got out of the passenger side and shut the door and i stood in an open parking spot next to my friends truck and noticed a light coming from the front of the car parked to the right of the open parking spot that i was standing in (my friend walked aroun the rear of the truck and stood about 8' behind where i was standing). all of the sudden i saw an orb of white light close to the size of a volleyball and about as bright at a 60 watt bulb start to move from the front the car to my right and went toward the front of my friends truck, but the made a sharp 90 degree left turn toward me. then the next orb came from in front of my friends truck and made a 90 degree turn to the right and got in line with the one in front of it. the 3rd orb came from the front of the car( parked to my right) and also did the same as the first orb and got in line with the others , the 4th orb came from the front of my friends truck, and the 5th orb came from the front of the car to my right. they were all  about 3 feet off the ground and moved passed me ( as they passed by me they came with in 2 feet away and the speed was like a slow walking pace, and made absolutely no noise), and went straight up to my friend, when they got with in inches of my friend one at a time they disappeared. i then said to my friend " what the hell was that "and he shouted back to me "i'm glad you saw it". i could of put my hand out to touch them but i was more curious to see what they were going to do and didn't want to disturb there movement (they move independently from each other but also move in formation). because of how close we were to the orbs i am 100% certain that it wasn't some reflection,  or something man made.  what we saw was deffinatly not that originated for this planet.
content.summary: 5 white orbs of lights that passed by me at 3' off the ground and came with in 1' of me and my friend.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my computer, then the neighbors dog started barking and didn't stop, i checked my cctv for anyone in front of the house but saw nothing, then i decided to see trough the window, and i saw a red line on the sky with my naked eyes. i went outside the house check if was some kind of reflection in my window, but the object still was there. i went inside, grabbed my binocullars (sakura 10x-90x50) and observed the object i sketched in the attachment.
content.summary: Oval object outlined with white lights shooting a green/red beam.

content.detailedDescription:
I've never had ufo encounters until the last 3 months. now i've had 2 major sightings.
on feb 9th or 10th at 12:35am, i saw 3 ufo's at the same time. i was on the back porch having a smoke, looking up as usual.
the first one,i didn't know what was up at first. it was partly cloudy. then the clouds started looking wiered. i looked & looked. there was an invisibility thing going on. it was like the triangle shaped craft itself was invisible, kind of shimmering, but it was framed with a solid row of color changing, very dim lights. it was moving very slow, hovering occasionally heading west. it reminded me of blackout drive in the military. it seemed pretty close. then a white orb came come the south heading north very fast, then it was gone. then an orange orb was coming from the west heading east very fast. at least as fast as a fighter jet or faster. it was blinking on and off extremely fast like it was advertising here i am.
the triangular shaped craft was still moving slow, but changed direction & started heading north. i ran out to the middle of the yard to get a better look. then i noticed that it had a very dim white light in each of the corners, but the craft itself remained invisible. then it moved slowly into the clouds heading north. i think it may have been an upgrade to the military tr-b3. but there was no big white light in the center of the craft. so, that one disappeared into the clouds. the white orb was long gone. the blinking orange orb was still heading east very fast and was soon gone.
my feelings were, shock, amazement & excitement all at the same time.
it almost didn't seem real. but i know what i saw.
i was military for 8 years. i've been to a lot of airforce bases & airports.  i'm always looking up. i've never seen anything like this. it was crazy. i had the feeling that something was going on & all the ships had to know each other was there. now that i know what the orbs look like & how the can act, i've seen them several times before. i think everyone probably has & just thought they were planes like i used to think. i had no mental interaction with any of the ufo's this time. and believe me, i tried.
please email me back & tell me what you think. has any one had similar encounters? do you know what the blinking orange orb was & why was it blinking? there was no white headlight or flashing red safety light. just orange.
i'm sorry i don't have any video. i never know when i'm going to see these things. if i get video, i will send it to you asap.
do you think there is a reason why i am seeing all these ufo's now? i'm 49
years old & have never seen such awesome stuff. i feel like i've fallen into a syfy movie, only better because it was real.
please email me.
                      thank you
                      [name removed/cms/rjl]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle framed with very dim colored lights. craft was also invisible with dim white lights in each corner. invisability like the movie predator. then a white orb. then an orange orb flashing on & off very fast. all at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were riding our bicycles on a sunday cloud free early afternoon on the street where we lived when suddenly i heard a crashing sound. i stopped and turned around to see my friend had fallen off his bike and was looking upward. when i too looked up i saw what had caused him to be shaken up and consequently fall. hovering no more than 30 feet above the parking lot was a flying saucer. there was no sound emanating from the object but it did have a bank of colored lights along the slightly tapered bottom. i cannot describe what the top looked like as i was so close to the object i was practically underneath it. hence my ability to describe with 100% certainty the characteristics of this object. within moments from our experience the object began to slowly move away in a straight path and then accelerated along the same path and disappeared within a blink of an eye. i remained motionless in awe rather than fear but my friend was profoundly affected and played a role in his failure to concentrate in school. to this day he refuses to speak of the incident.
content.summary: Siting ocurred during a late august day in the year 1962

content.detailedDescription:
4:05am.Nov.29th 2014.I was on my back porch smoking a cigarette looking into the sky like i always do.I saw an orange/yellow orb flying east over town.I thought in my mind,"if your a ufo turn blue." a second afterwards, it turned blue, then back to orange. i almost fell over. i was shocked. in my mind, i asked if i could come with them several times. it kept flashing red, then back to orange. it got near the hutch airport, then vanished & reappeared to the north.Then vanished & reappeared in the previous spot. i asked in my mind if i could come with them in the future. it exploded in neon green. the outer edges of the orb seemed to spit out neon green. then it turned back to orange & started getting smaller & smaller. then it turned white & was gone into space. coolest thing i ever saw until earlier this month. i will make a separate report.
i am 49 years old. i've never seen a ufo definitively until that morning.
it was awesome. 
i could not read their minds, but they could obviously read mine.
when i first noticed it i thought it was a plane. but, there was no constant white headlight & no flashing red light like planes always have. plus it was orange/yellow.
my feelings were shock, amazement, & now i know for sure we are not alone & no one can tell me any different.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Normally color orange/yellow. turned blue when i asked it to ion my mind. turned red. explored in neon green. back to orange, took piggy & turned white, then into space.

content.detailedDescription:
All'et di 16 anni ho avuto un contatto prolungato con due entit aliene che si sono alternate tra loro nel corpo di un umano.
la prima entit che si  svelata mi ha lasciato perplesso e scettico. ho avuto la possibilit di parlare molto con lui e ho annotato in un diario i concetti fondamentali sperando in contraddizioni ch svelassero uno scerzo di questo mio compagno di scuola. la perplessit  cresciuta quando questo mi ha comunicato che sarebbe stato sostituito e punito per essersi svelato a me. ricordo ancora il mal di testa, il torpore e lo stordimento di quel preciso momento in cui gli stavo parlando e mi comunica "l'altro ti saluta". 
da questo momento comincio a notare stranezze che durano per due settimane circa: l'entit non ricorda i nomi delle persone che frequenta quotidianamente, definisce durante un'interrogazione a scuola un personaggio storico come "un terrestrre",  impacciato nei normali movimenti fisici e ha gli occhi diversi, non chiude le palpebre.
le mie curiosit e le mie domande sono continuate per circa due settimane, poi di colpo  tornato ad essere la solita persona che conoscevo da tanto. ho sempre creduto che potesse essere una burla, ma i fatti strani sono stati tanti, come ad esempio l'anticipazione che avrei avuto un incidente e avrebbe dovuto sabotare un veicolo affinch la collisione non avesse luogo (fatto che dopo due giorni ho riscontrato vedendo il veicolo da lui descritto nell'unica officina nel raggio di 30 km da dove abitavo).
ora mi trovo con un diario curioso con annotate tutte le cose comunicatemi.
non voglio far perdere tempo a nessuno di voi, vi stimo e seguo le vostre teorie. sta a voi dare o meno attendibilit al mio accaduto ed eventualmente voler analizzare le poche pagine scritte vent'anni fa e sempre prese ironicamente da una persona che attualmente ha 37 anni.... 
grazie per l'attenzione e mi scuso se scrivo in italiano e non in inglese.
arrivederci.
content.summary: Contatto con alieno in corpo di umano conosciuto
